name: code-guardian
description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Deterministic security scanning layer for Claude Code. Auto-detects stack, runs open-source security CLI tools (SAST, secrets, dependencies, containers, IaC), auto-fixes issues, and recommends CI additions. Supports interactive and yolo modes. Check https://github.com/stefanoginella/claude-code-plugins/blob/main/plugins/code-guardian/README.md for details.
